summary: The DevSecOps Engineers course is a comprehensive program designed to train DevOps experts with a specialization in cyber and cloud technologies. The course is structured to provide a broad foundation in Linux administration and programming, followed by advanced tools and secure coding practices. Students will learn Python programming, virtualization, containerization with Docker, and orchestration with Kubernetes. The program also covers CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins or GitHub CI, AWS cloud services, and infrastructure as code with Terraform. Additionally, students will gain expertise in monitoring and alerting systems using ELK Stack, Grafana, and Prometheus. The course prepares students for three prestigious international certifications: LPIC-1, AWS Cloud Practitioner, and CCSP. The program includes practical projects, presentations, and personal branding workshops to prepare students for the job market. The course is delivered by experienced instructors and includes access to AWS and ISC2 resources for further professional development.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: DevSecOps Engineers - המסלול השלם להכשרת מומחי DevOps עם התמחות בטכנולוגיות סייבר וענן.

COURSE OVERVIEW: This comprehensive program is designed to train DevSecOps experts with a focus on cybersecurity and cloud technologies. Over the past two years, the demand for DevOps experts has increased by 75%, and mentions on LinkedIn as a skill have risen by 50%. This course integrates security aspects into DevOps, addressing the global trend of accelerating development processes where code is frequently deployed to production systems automatically.

COURSE LEADERSHIP: The program is led by Mr. Eran Shaham, Director of the School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security at Bar-Ilan University. The professional advisor is Mr. Gidi Farkash, President of the Israeli Chapter of the international ISC2 organization. Mr. Yuval Shaul, a DevOps Engineer with extensive experience in information security and cyber courses, also contributes to the program.

PREREQUISITES: The course is open to IT professionals, software testers, and programmers. Graduates with degrees in engineering and exact sciences are also eligible. An admission interview conducted by the school's academic advisor is required. Technical English reading and comprehension are necessary.

CERTIFICATIONS AWARDED: The program prepares students for three prestigious international certifications: LPIC-1: Linux Administrator by LPI, AWS Cloud Practitioner by AWS, and CCSP by ISC2.

COURSE SCHEDULE: 
- Start Date: 06.01.2025
- Duration: Approximately ten months
- Schedule: Sundays from 17:30 to 21:30 and Fridays from 09:00 to 13:00
- Academic Hours: 350 hours

LEARNING FORMAT: 
- Location: School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security, Bar-Ilan University Campus, Ramat Gan
- Some classes may be conducted via Zoom, subject to university and Home Front Command guidelines.

TUITION AND FEES: 
- Registration Fee: 480 ₪
- Tuition Fee: 15,800 ₪
- Includes original ISC2 study kit at no additional cost
- Graduates receive a 20% discount voucher for one year for the AWS Solutions Architect Associate certification upgrade course.

COURSE TOPICS: 
- Domain 1: Becoming DevSecOps Expert (5 Hours)
  - Introduction to DevSecOps
  - Developing a DevSecOps career
  - Building a LinkedIn profile
- Domain 2: Linux Administration and LPI LPIC-1 Exam preparation (40 Hours)
  - Shell Basics, System Administration, Network Management
- Domain 3: Git and GitHub (10 Hours)
  - Version control, Branching, GitHub/GitLab integration
- Domain 4: Bash Scripting and Programming (30 Hours)
  - Bash scripting, SQL, NoSQL databases
- Domain 5: Python Programming (60 Hours)
  - Python basics, OOP, Web development
- Domain 6: Virtualization and Containers (15 Hours)
  - Docker, Container lifecycle, Networking
- Domain 7: Kubernetes (30 Hours)
  - K8s architecture, Pod management, Helm
- Domain 8: The CI/CD Pipeline (Jenkins or GitHub CI) (25 Hours)
  - Jenkins pipelines, GitLab CI
- Domain 9: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner (40 Hours)
  - AWS Cloud infrastructure, Security, Pricing models
- Domain 10: Infrastructure as a code - Terraform (15 Hours)
  - Terraform usage, Modules
- Domain 11: Monitoring and Alerting systems (25 Hours)
  - ELK Stack, Grafana, Prometheus
- Domain 12: ISC2 Cloud Security Professional - CCSP (45 Hours)
  - Cloud security concepts, Legal and compliance
- Domain 13: Final Projects Presentation (10 Hours)
  - Real-world scenarios, Project presentation
